thread.section_title: TicketCity Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TicketCity | www.ticketcity.com | 6 of 289
thread.title: Robin

author: Robin
title: Robin
text:
Kendall went above and beyond to help me find just the right seat for the Lion King, Detroit. The show was fantastic and I will call/email her again the next time we attend an event. She was kind, organized, reliable and she didn't rush me into a decision I would regret.
Kendall also called and emailed to help understand how to send my upcoming tickets & hopefully get them sold. (I had accidentally purchased Lin King tickets for the wrong date and need to sell those.) My tickets for this upcoming Sunday have not yet sold but keeping my fingers crossed there.
